meanings.sent1: The unsized paper absorbed the ink quickly.
meanings.sent2: The unsized canvas allowed the paint to seep through.
meanings.sent3: The unsized shirt shrunk in the wash, much to my surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her unsized ambition knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The unsized sponge soaked up the spilled water in seconds.

meanings.sent1: The unsized box could fit various items.
meanings.sent2: The unsized font made the text difficult to read.
meanings.sent3: His unsized shoes kept slipping off his feet.
meanings.sent4: The unsized cloud seemed to stretch across the sky forever.
meanings.sent5: The unsized crowd filled the entire stadium.
